title: Star Guardian Survey email
body: Yeah I just completed the Star Guardian survey email and thoroughly enjoyed the experience and getting to write out my thoughts on the gamemode. Is there any more of these that I could complete? Or any other avenues to have discussions on such subjects?

replies.body: The boards are a fantastic place to supply us with feedback and discuss with the community.  Specifically, I recommend posting on the [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) boards.  Thanks for helping out, and I'm glad you enjoyed the Star Guardian events.  :D
